summary: Three scientists unlawfully remove the still living brain of a dead tycoon and experiment with it but the evil brain begins to telepathically control the lead scientist.
cast: Lew Ayres|Gene Evans|Nancy Reagan|Steve Brodie|Tom Powers|Lisa Howard|James Anderson|Victor Sutherland|Michael Colgan|Peter Adams|Harlan Warde|Shimen Ruskin|Don Brodie|William Cottrell|John Hamilton|Sam Harris|Paul Hoffman|Stapleton Kent|Faith Langley|Mark Lowell|Frank McLure|Walter Merrill|Charles Sullivan|Max Wagner
director: Director: Felix E. Feist (as Felix Feist)
title: Donovan's Brain
